page.title: 02Leisure in Ribchester
page.content: We asked 35 children how they spent their leisure.The most popular ones were T.V.-28.Going to the Rec.-21. Shopping-22.Looking after pets-23. Visiting-25.Quite a lot of people go to the Rec.The Recreation grounds have a slide,a witches hat,some swings.There is a playingfield for football and cricket.Every Saturday we have a football match on the playing field,and at the back there is a tennis court.You can go on the Rec. at any time and play. You are not allowed to have bikes and horses on the Rec.The Rec. has a few benches around the side.The playing field is used for Field Day as well then have a lot of races for all ages,and exhibitions.Also the school uses it for games.
